inlineContent.text: This cluster allows a client to manage the power draw of a device. An example of such a client could be an Energy Management System (EMS) which controls an Energy Smart Appliance (ESA).

abstract.text: Communicate with and control smart home devices from a variety of manufacturers.
For all instance methods (reads, writes, commands) that take a completion,
the completion will be called on the provided queue.
The group of methods that are fundamental to all Objective-C objects.
A type that can be hashed into a `Hasher` to produce an integer hash value.
A type that can be compared for value equality.
A type with a customized textual representation.
A type with a customized textual representation suitable for debugging purposes.
A type whose instances can be encoded, and appropriately passed, as elements of a C `va_list`.
